name: puddletown-js-env
description: Converts a string to a URL friendly string

scripts.build: npm run test && npm run docs && rollup src/index.js --o bundle.js --f cjs
scripts.docs: rimraf docs && documentation build src/** -f html -o docs
scripts.test: rimraf coverage && nyc --reporter=lcov mocha || true && rimraf .nyc_output
